subdisciplines.name: Market Structure and Market Power
subdisciplines.description: The study of how firms in a market interact with each other and the effects of that interaction on market outcomes.

subdisciplines.name: Industrial Economics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how industries and markets function and how competition and regulation affect firms and consumers.

subdisciplines.name: Game Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of mathematical models of strategic interaction among rational decision-makers.
